meanings.definition: The quality of being suave and sophisticated in appearance or manner.
meanings.sent1: His debonairness at the party impressed everyone with his stylish outfit and confident demeanor.
meanings.sent2: She exuded debonairness at the event, effortlessly mingling with guests and charming them with her wit.
meanings.sent3: His debonairness was so striking that even the shyest guests felt at ease around him.
meanings.sent4: The debonairness of his gestures on the dance floor was like a graceful ballet performance.
meanings.sent5: The debonairness of his smile left a lasting impression on everyone he met.

meanings.definition: The state of being charming and confident in social situations.
meanings.sent1: Her debonairness in conversation made her the life of the party, captivating everyone with her stories.
meanings.sent2: His natural debonairness made networking events seem like a breeze, effortlessly making connections with ease.
meanings.sent3: The debonairness of his jokes always brought a smile to everyone's face, lightening the mood instantly.
meanings.sent4: Her debonairness in handling difficult situations was like watching a skilled magician perform magic tricks.
meanings.sent5: The debonairness of his compliments made even the toughest critics feel appreciated and valued.
